description.part1: Start with a complete and reliable foundation built with
description.part2: that save you hours of setup and help you launch faster.

q1.question: üöÄ What is OpenNextJS?
q1.answer: OpenNextJS is an open-source fullstack boilerplate based on Next.js + TypeScript, created to accelerate the development of SaaS, dashboards, and modern applications. It includes authentication, payments, storage, analytics, integrated documentation, and a fully customizable foundation.

q2.question: üß© What's included?
q2.answer:
OpenNextJS comes with everything you need to build a real product:

‚Ä¢ Modern authentication (email, OAuth, roles and permissions)
‚Ä¢ Payments and plans with Stripe or Lemon Squeezy
‚Ä¢ Database with Prisma and Neon
‚Ä¢ Administration dashboard
‚Ä¢ Documentation with Nextra (MDX)
‚Ä¢ Emails with Resend and React Email
‚Ä¢ Security with Cloudflare Turnstile
‚Ä¢ Integrated analytics (PostHog / GA4)
‚Ä¢ Theme system with dark/light mode and full customization support

q3.question: üé® Can I customize the theme?
q3.answer:
Absolutely. OpenNextJS is built with ShadCN/UI, Tailwind, and a modular Theme Provider. You can change:

‚Ä¢ Colors, typographies, and global layout
‚Ä¢ Transitions and animations (Framer Motion)
‚Ä¢ Reusable components (Cards, Inputs, Charts, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Documentation theme (Nextra)
‚Ä¢ Dark mode and custom variants

The entire visual system is designed to easily adapt to your brand or product.

q4.question: ‚öôÔ∏è Why use OpenNextJS?
q4.answer:
üîã Production-ready from the first deploy
üß† Clean and scalable architecture (App Router + Server Actions)
üí≥ Complete integrations (auth, payments, AI, storage, email, SEO)
üåç Ready-to-use internationalization (next-intl)
üß± Modular and extensible: activate only the modules you need
üí° Open source and free

q5.question: üí¨ Who is it designed for?
q5.answer:
OpenNextJS is ideal for:

‚Ä¢ Developers who want to launch a SaaS or MVP quickly
‚Ä¢ Teams looking for a solid foundation to scale
‚Ä¢ Creators who value good design + clean code
‚Ä¢ Those who want to learn a modern Next.js architecture

q6.question: üß≠ What can I build with OpenNextJS?
q6.answer:
‚Ä¢ SaaS with plans and credits
‚Ä¢ Dashboards with roles and analytics
‚Ä¢ Landing pages with integrated SEO
‚Ä¢ Apps with AI and storage
‚Ä¢ Administrative panels and multitenancy

hoursSaved.subtitle: Everything a modern SaaS needs, pre-configured and ready to scale üöÄ

ui.desc: Visual system with shadcn/ui, Tailwind, dark mode and responsive design.

ux.title: UX & Animations
ux.desc: Smooth transitions with Framer Motion and GSAP, fluid interaction and micro-details.

legal.title: Legal Pages & Docs (MDX)
legal.desc: Docs with Nextra, Terms, Privacy and automatic navigation.

analytics.title: Analytics & Monitoring
analytics.desc: Base integration for PostHog, LogSnag or GA4 with user metrics and usage.
